channel.title: New Home 525!
channel.description: I made a 525 like 100+ ppl say i leeched how do i change a 525's home plz help!

item.title: New Home 525!
item.dc:creator: @srpwnz srpwnz
item.description:
@srpwnz wrote:

[quote=“WestSideMass, post:7, topic:307931”]You should use a 317. It looks like your getting confused with 525s, but trust me, you won’t get as confused with 317s. Everyone has to ask questions sometimes, so make a 317, and if you have any problems, you know where the help section is. :P[/quote]Holy crap can you read im asking how to use hamachi this topic is over the home i wanna know how to use hamachi for 317s![br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2009, 01:57:43 pm[/size][hr]ugh any1 can explain how to change a 525 home thats all i know how to make…if i knewhow to make a 317 i would…

Read full topic

item.title: New Home 525!
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“srpwnz, post:6, topic:307931”][quote author=Epic Ancient link=topic=404045.msg2991054#msg2991054 date=1255290710]

[quote author=srpwnz link=topic=404045.msg2991051#msg2991051 date=1255290519]

[quote author=mandood77 link=topic=404045.msg2991049#msg2991049 date=1255290343]

Try working with 317s first. They’re way easier to code, than a 525.

508s are just confusing as all hell.
[/quote]I agree, start with a 317, gradually grow to 474, than start 508+ I might do that
[/quote]Well didnt answer my question cuz i get really confused on making a 317 i get stuck i portfowarded alot! i set my variables…and my no-ip still dsnt work!

Port Forwarding isn’t required to make a server. It’s just making it public. And you have to Port Forward to get ANY server Public.

You can use Hamachi, to host, as well…

317 Coding is BY FAR the easiest of them all. I’d even say easier than RSC…
[/quote]yah but i have 2 things idk how to make a hamachi 317 server 2 i dont know how to use hamachi and 3 tell me and ill try hamachi :)![/quote]

There’s no “Hamachi — Servers”. It’s just a program that lets people access your connection (safe-ish) and get on your Server.

-You download it.
–You make a name + set it up.
—You create a network.
----You run your server.
-----You get people to join.
------They Login.
-------It works.

Read full topic

item.title: New Home 525!
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

You should use a 317. It looks like your getting confused with 525s, but trust me, you won’t get as confused with 317s. Everyone has to ask questions sometimes, so make a 317, and if you have any problems, you know where the help section is.

Read full topic
